name: Total number of workers for R&D-performing companies with 1–4 employees, by industry: 2016
description: Total number of workers for R&D-performing companies with 1–4 employees, by industry: 2016

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_owners_who_do_not_receive_a_w_2_
variableMeasured.description: Owners Who Do Not Receive A W 2

variableMeasured.name: field_employees_who_are_not_considered_owners_
variableMeasured.description: Employees Who Are Not Considered Owners

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Detail may not add to total because of rounding. Industry classification based on sample NAICS code. Statistics are representative of companies located in the United States that performed or funded R&D.
sources: National Science Foundation, National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, and U.S. Census Bureau, Microbusiness R&D and Innovation Survey, 2016.
